level.heading: Regulations.
level.text: The Registrar may issue regulations as necessary to carry out the purposes of this chapter. The regulations shall be issued according to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 7-228.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-34
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-34, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 7-201.
